mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_goods (gdsNum, gdsName, cateCode, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsThumbImg)
values (tbl_goods_seq.nextval, #{gdsName}, #{cateCode}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock}, #{gdsDes}, #{gdsImg}, #{gdsThumbImg})
mapper.select: select level, cateName, cateCode, cateCodeRef from goods_category start with cateCodeRef is null connect by prior cateCode = cateCodeRef

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg ,g.gdsDate from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode

select count(g.gdsNum) from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where
gdsNum >0

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsThumbImg
from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}

SELECT orderId, userId, orderRec,userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3,userAddr4, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery from( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_order pk_tbl_order)*/ ROWNUM rn,orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3,userAddr4, orderPhon, amount, orderDate, delivery from tbl_order where
ROWNUM <=#{pageNum}*#{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}

select o.orderId, o.userId, o.orderRec, o.userAddr1, o.userAddr2, o.userAddr3,userAddr4, o.orderPhon, o.amount, o.orderDate, o.delivery, d.orderDetailsNum, d.gdsNum, d.cartStock, g.gdsName, g.gdsThumbImg, g.gdsPrice ,o.delivery from tbl_order o inner join tbl_order_details d on o.orderId = d.orderId inner join tbl_goods g on d.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.orderId = #{orderId}
select r.gdsNum, r.userId, r.repNum, r.repCon, r.repDate, m.name as userName from tbl_reply r inner join ark_newmember2 m on r.userId = m.id

select count(id)
from ark_newmember2 where
uoop >0

SELECT count(orderid)
FROM tbl_order where
USERADDR1 >0

rownum <=#{pageNum}*#{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
